bug.author: ManishAradwad
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>URL(s) with the issue:</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h2>https://github.com/tensorflow/examples/blob/master/courses/udacity_intro_to_tensorflow_lite/tflite_c05_exercise_rock_paper_scissors.ipynb</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h2></denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h2>Description of issue (what needs changing):</denchmark-h>
I think this exercise doesn't make use of cats_vs_dogs dataset, right?? <denchmark-h:h3>Clear description</denchmark-h>
In place of cats_vs_dogs dataset, rock_paper_scissors dataset should be mentioned. <denchmark-h:h3>Submit a pull request?</denchmark-h>
Yes, shortly

comments.comment: the dataset is not loading when opening the code in google colab. both dog vs cats and rock_paper_scissors.

Number 5 is an exercise with parts the reader needs to complete. Number 6 is the solution, it works fine in colab. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Rinkal2>@Rinkal2</denchmark-link> can you be more specific? what is the problem you're seeing?
Closing this issue since the associated PR has merged. Feel free to reopen if necessary. Thanks!
